DANCER IN THE DARK

Dancer in the Dark is a 2000 Danish musical drama film directed by Lars von Trier and starring Icelandic singer BjÃƒÂ¶rk, Catherine Deneuve, David Morse, Cara Seymour, Peter Stormare, Siobhan Fallon Hogan, and Joel Grey. Three songs from Rodgers and Hammerstein's The Sound of Music were also used in the film.
